Title: Clear Patrol - Heros
Descriptions: Some Heros have made camp up at Devils Castle and have been shooting up the nearby Hiding places. They need to be dealt with.
Head up to Devils Castle and clear out the Heros. They are a small group but they are well armed and dangerous. Be careful.
Nice work, we could use more people like you. Here is your reward.
ObjectiveText: Kill all units of the Hero patrol group at the marked location.
